metadata.title: Telehealth Infrastructure Scalability
metadata.overview: Case study on how we scaled a telehealth platform's infrastructure to support a 500% increase in user traffic.

objections.objection: We are concerned about performance during peak loads.
objections.response: Our architecture is designed for auto-scaling, ensuring high performance and availability during demand spikes.
